segments.text: I'd like to buy a house about 300m with a garden . Can you help me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . We've helped more than ten thousand people buy and sell houses . We're the No . 1 realtor in this community . I recommend this house ( He points at a picture ) .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: On a hill to the east of the Tarsus river . You have a good view of the beautiful sunrise and sunset . You can't find a better home to live in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Eight rooms , a roomy kitchen , two modem bathrooms , a lovely dining room , a gorgeous living room and three sweet bedrooms . All are built with first-rate materials .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 6 million . You needn't pay the whole price at one time . You just pay 50 % in cash . We'll process the legal documents for you and then you can borrow the other 50 % from a bank and repay it in installments . We ask for only 1 % as commission .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . How much is the deposit ?
segments.speaker: S1
